```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ngc6544 <- read_csv("1657065339571O-result.csv") 
```


```{libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

## Regression of ra + dec

```{r X1657065339571O_result, echo=FALSE}
lm(ra ~ dec, data = X1657065339571O_result)
```

## graph of ra + dec, pmra + pmdec
```{r}
ggplot(X1657065339571O_result, aes(x= dec, y = ra)) + geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(X1657065339571O_result, aes(x= pmdec, y = pmra)) + geom_point()
```


```{r}
## Proper motion 
```
```{r}
ggplot(X1657065339571O_result, aes(x= bp_rp, y = phot_g_mean_mag)) + geom_point()
```
```{r}
hist(X1657065339571O_result$radial_velocity, breaks = 20)
# Radio Velocity 
```
```{r}
hist(X1657065339571O_result$mh_gspphot, breaks = 5)
# metallicity over hydrogen
```
